# Capturing Body Motion in 3D

**Sample Code**

Track a person in the physical environment and visualize their motion by applying the same body movements to a virtual character.

## Overview

To run the sample, use an iOS device with an A12 chip or later.



## Body Position Tracking

- **Rigging a Model for Motion Capture**: Configure custom 3D models so ARKit’s human body-tracking feature can control them.
- **Validating a Model for Motion Capture**: Verify that your character model matches ARKit’s Motion Capture requirements.
- **ARBodyAnchor**: An anchor that tracks the position and movement of a human body in the rear-facing camera.
